title: 33. THE BEST TIPS FOR NEW ESTIES! Relaxing in Your Professional, Client Relationships, Finding a Niche and Networking With Integrity.
description:
Hi Roomies!! For this episode, I asked current licensed professionals to submit their top tips for new estheticians. Congrats to my recent grads and new professionals, this one's for you! 

This episode covers the biggest tips for succeeding as a new estie including:

- importance of continued education

- networking with integrity

- finding your niche

- prioritizing client relationships 

- relaxing in your professional + being yourself

You can shop my Glymed store here

or DM me on Instagram to purchase IS Clinical 

MY SOCIAL MEDIA:
